document.title: Social Support, Coping, and Medication Adherence Among HIV-Positive Women with Depression Living in Rural Areas of the Southeastern United States
document.publication-title: Faculty Publications and Other Works -- Nursing

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Vyavaharkar, M., Moneyham, L., Tavakoli, A., Phillips, K. D., Murdaugh, C., Jackson, K., & Meding, G. (2007). Social support, coping and medication adherence among HIV+ women with depression living in rural areas of the southeastern United States. AIDS Patient Care and STDs, 21(9), 667-680.
